DOC.detailed_description: Patients age 1-18 year undergo general , plastic orthopedic surgery expect moderate severe pain least 24 hour postoperatively , meet inclusion criterion meet exclusion criterion , enrol . At end surgical procedure , skin closure , patient give 1,5 mg/kg intravenous ketoprofen repeat every 8 hour till 4,5 mg/kg/24 h. Patients paracetamol group additionally give first dose IV paracetamol 20 mg/kg repeat 6 20 hour postoperatively till 60 mg/kg/24 h. Patients placebo group give 0.9 % sodium chloride 2 ml/kg IV repeat 6 20 hour postoperatively . After surgery optional rescue analgesia give patient request : either tramadol dose 2 mg/kg ( till 4 mg/kg/24h ) , either patient-controlled analgesia ( PCA ) morphine , indicate accord standard care . Patients evaluate till 24 hour postoperatively . After patient follow long indicate per standard care .
